title: Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Agriculture, Food and the Marine
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Agriculture, Food and the Marine 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited agriculture food marine (delegation ministerial functions) (no 2) order 2025

title: Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine conferred on him – 

(a) 

by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in Part 2 

of the Schedule, and 

(c) 

under the Regulations specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, 

 are delegated to Timmy Dooley, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [368] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister agriculture food marine conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) provision enactment specified part 2 schedule (c) regulation specified part 3 schedule delegated timmy dooley minister state department agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th july 2025 368 3

title: Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: Foreshore Act 1933 (No. 12 of 1933), other than section 13A(4)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Foreshore Act 1933 (No. 12 of 1933), other than section 13A(4) 

Sea Fisheries Act 1952 (No. 7 of 1952) 

Fishery Harbour Centres Act 1968 (No. 18 of 1968) 

Marine Institute Act 1991 (No. 2 of 1991), other than section 4A 

Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1997 (No. 23 of 1997) 

Sea Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) 

Part 2 

Parts 2 and 3 of the Fisheries (Amendment) Act 2003 (No. 21 of 2003) 

Part 2 of the Maritime Safety Act 2005 (No. 11 of 2005) in so far as that Part 
relates to a fishery harbour centre (within the meaning of that Act) 

Part 3 

Regulation 42 of the European Communities (Birds and Natural Habitats) 
Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 477 of 2011) 

European Union (Birds and Natural Habitats) (Sea-fisheries) Regulations 2013 
(S.I. No. 290 of 2013) 

European Union (Labelling of Fishery and Aquaculture Products) Regulations 
2016 (S.I. No. 121 of 2016) 

European Union (Common Fisheries Policy) (Point System) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 318 of 2020) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 

22 July, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [368] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
